SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Board
Represents the main game board, containing an array of 40 tiles and methods to initialize, manage, and display the board.
Card
Represents a generic base class for all card types in the game.
ChanceCard
Represents a Chance card with a description and effect.
ChanceTile
Represents a tile on the board that triggers a Chance card draw.
CommunityChestCard
Represents a Community Chest card with a description and effect.
CommunityChestTile
Represents a tile on the board that triggers a Community Chest card draw.
Dice
Represents a pair of six-sided dice used in the game.
FreeParkingTile
Represents the Free Parking tile on the board.
GoTile
Represents the "Go" tile on the board.
GoToJailTile
Represents the "Go To Jail" tile on the board.
JailTile
Represents the Jail tile on the board.
MonopolyGUI
The main GUI class for the Armopoly game (a Monopoly variant).
Player
Represents a player in the game, tracking their state such as money, position, properties, jail status, and special conditions.
Property
Represents a purchasable property tile on the board.
Station
Represents a Station tile on the board.
Tile
Represents an abstract tile on the game board.
